content.rendered:
Trained by Kirt (TBK) is a top-quality personal trainer and healthy lifestyle coach located in Torquay, Devon.  He has a great local reputation for getting clients results and was needing to further his reach in order to grow his businesses.

The Right Fit

We have worked with TBK before in setting up their previous training business and creating all of the brandings. We knew that in order for TBK to further their reach, they needed to have the ability to advertise online coaching packages on their website, along with being able to take payment online. We know e-commerce, the fitness industry, and TBK very well. We were pleased to have the opportunity to work with TBK again. 

The Problem

TBKs existing website was around 4 years old, and started showing signs of age against other modern websites. Plus, there was not any ability to get visitors to purchase coaching packages online.

The Results

A new website design now represented the TBK brand to its full potential and delivers confidence to those who visit. The new website has been cleverly structured to increase the number of leads and purchases of coaching packages.

In the first 4 weeks of launch, organic traffic has remained in line with the previous website. However, TBK has had 20+ enquiries and there have been 6 new clients come on board.
